NAME: serverinfo
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view the server's information.
INFOS:
**{{name}} - Informations**

👑 | Server owner: **{{owner}}**
🔤 | Server name: **{{name}}**
🕐 | Creation date: **{{date}}**
🛂 | Verification level: **{{verification}}**
🔢 | Number of members: **{{memberCount}}**
👨 | Humans: **{{humans}}**
🤖 | Bots: **{{bots}}**
📌 | Number of channels: **{{channels}}**
📕 | Number of roles: **{{roles}}**
💯 | Number of emojis: **{{emojis}}**
